# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes

(?:^|/)(?i)third[-_]?party/
(?:^|/)3rdparty/

(?:^|/)generated/
(?:^|/)go\.sum$

(?:^|/)Pipfile$
(?:^|/)pyproject.toml
(?:^|/)vendor/
(?:^|/|\b)requirements(?:-dev|-doc|-test|)\.txt$

^\.github/actions/spelling/
^\Q.github/FUNDING.yml\E$
^\Q.config/trippy.dic\E$
^\Q.config/spellcheck.toml\E$
^\Q.devcontainer/devcontainer.json\E$
^\Q.github/workflows/spelling.yml\E$
^\Qcrates/trippy-tui/locales.toml\E$
^\Qcrates/trippy-tui/src/geoip.rs\E$
^\Qcrates/trippy-tui/tests/resources/snapshots/trippy_tui__config__tests__compare_snapshot@trip.snap\E$
^\Qcrates/trippy-tui/tests/resources/snapshots/trippy_tui__config__tests__compare_snapshot@trip_--help.snap\E$
^\Qcrates/trippy-tui/tests/resources/snapshots/trippy_tui__config__tests__compare_snapshot@trip_-h.snap\E$
^\Qcrates/trippy-tui/tests/resources/snapshots/trippy_tui__print__tests__output@generate_bash_shell_completions.snap\E$

^crates/trippy/README\.md$
